name: Bonescythe Bracers
tooltip:
Bonescythe BracersLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Bonescythe Bracers if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Bracers, 6 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar, 2 Cured Rugged Hides and 10 gold pieces.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Bracers
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 6
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
- Money:10
